title: Mastering change: video workbook [text]
brief_description: Change occurs in all the areas of our lives and cannot be avoided. This workbook, which accompanies the video set looks at skills which can be developed to successfully cope with and make the most of change.
description: Change occurs in all the areas of our lives and cannot be avoided. This workbook, which accompanies the video set looks at skills which can be developed to successfully cope with and make the most of change.
